content.text: Not much, just relaxing. I'm the oldest of 3 boys. I wish I could travel the world and play music like my brother. I'm vegan and my favorite food is Italian. What about you?

I have a black belt in karate and a dog. I got married last year. My children are a disappointment. I don't really care to travel. I like to be home. I listen to Charlie Daniels music and cuddle with my dog. How about you?

I wish I could have a black belt in karate. I listen to hip hop and my favorite movie is The Princess Bride. I like to cook and watch movies. I don't have any kids yet. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the gym and play video games. I don't have much time for fun. I work a lot. I'm glad you like to cook. I love to eat. I'm getting hungry. Do you want to go get something to eat?
Sure! I'm in the mood for Italian. Do you know a good place?
Yes, I know a great place. We should go
